availability.p: Copyright © 2018, Christopher Alan Mosher, Shelton, Connecticut, USA.
availability.licence: This work is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0 International License.

correction.p: OCR generated transcript has not been corrected.

normalization.p: Only minor normalization where needed, if any, is indicated via markup.

punctuation.p: All punctuation marks in the source text have been retained, and are represented by appropriate Unicode code points.
Punctuation may be marked up with pc elements for clarification, but not exclusively.

quotation.p: All quotation marks have been retained, and are represented by appropriate Unicode code points.

hyphenation.p: Hyphenated words that appear at the end of a line have been retained. The hyphen, if present, is represented by the Unicode code point, and marked up with a pc element. The break="no" attribute on the lb element indicates that a single word is split across the lines.

interpretation.p: Dates, places, and names may be marked up, where useful.

CERTIFIED to be a true copy of an entry in the certified copy of a register of Marriages in the Registration District of ...Stockton and Sedgefield,.
Given at the General Register Office, under the Seal of the said Office, the gth day of August 2006
MXC733565
This certificate is issued in pursuance of section 65 of the Marriage Act 1949. Sub-.section .3 of that section provides that any cerlitied copy of an entry
purporting to be sealed or stamped with the seal of the General Register Office shall be received as evidence of the maniage to which it relates without any further or
other proof of the entry, and no certified copy purporting to have been given in the said Office shall be of any force or effect unless it is sealed or stamped as aforesaid.

Registrar of Vital Statistics
Corning, NY 14530
Dear Sirs;
Would you kindly send me one full copy of the Birth
Certificate of the following person:
Hannah Taylorson
sex: Female race: White
father: Thomas Taylorson
mother: imknown
horn: March 30, 1852 Corning, New York
This person is my great-great-grandmother. I will be
using this certificate for genealogical purposes.
Enclosed is S2.C0. Thank You
Very truly yours.
Chris Mosher

Twila O'Dell
Steuben County Historian
3 Pulteney Sq. E.
Bath, NY 14810-1500
Ms. O'Dell:
I have found an OBITUARY listed on your weh site that I hoped you would be kind
enough to copy for me. The listing is shown as follows:
Last name: TAYLORSON
First name: Robert
Source: Corning Journal (Coming, NY)
Source date: 12/26/1889
Death: 1889, Coming
You may send the copy using the enclosed self-addressed stamped envelope. Please also
find enclosed $1.00.
Thank you,
Chris Mosher

our TiUago, died on Friday, Dec, 20. He
was born in Durham Co., England, in 1797.
In the year 1849 he eDttigratod to this coun
try, a widower,, bringing^ with him three
daughters and one^sou-j^ He was a carpen
ter by trade and came ̂directly to Painted
Post and began to work at hi* ^wdo. In

of Oromarty, Scotland, and the following
year built the house on the comer of Che-

pied until his death." His wife and her two
daUghiers. Mrs, Margaret Tobias and Mrs,
